title: Marvel Masterworks: Atlas Era Tales of Suspense Vol. 4 HC Variant (Hardcover)
description: The Marvel Masterworks bring you the final, fantastic volume of TALES OF SUSPENSE with another dose of giant monsters, intergalactic alien invaders and weird menaces. Including each complete pre-hero issue, as well as the many never-before-reprinted backup stories that supported Iron Man after his debut, crafted by a who’s who list of top talent: Stan Lee, Jack Kirby, Steve Ditko, Don Heck, Jack Davis and more. This must-have volume brings you the stories that were the crucible for the Marvel Age of Comics, so don’t wait — reserve your copy today! Collecting TALES OF SUSPENSE (1959) #32-48 and #50-54.
